content.description:
A collection of large boulders just north of the Whirlpool Point Loop hiking trail. Some work has been done, but lots of potential for (ethical) development remains. Please be respectful of other people using the area - far more than just boulderers make use of the trails and cliffs here.

Write up originally shared on Sendage website by Unknown.  There are about 10 routes currently posted on the Sendage website.

******Edit July 28 2021 6:12 pm Hi all  I'm the original developer, user Neonhandrail, and some of the information on these Boulders is hopefully to be under discussion with Jonas, with corrections, soon. Best, Dan
